title: OPD: Woman shot herself in leg
content:
Odessa Police Department spokesman Cpl. Steve LeSueur said police were called out at 11:43 a.m. Tuesday to the 1700 block of La Casa Drive about a gunshot victim.
The woman reportedly told police that she was setting the gun down when it went off and shot her.
LeSueur said she was transported to Medical Center Hospital with non-life-threatening injuries.
